title: 188: Scouting in College vs the NFL
itunes:title: 188: Scouting in College vs the NFL
description:
Daniel Jeremiah is joined by former NFL Scout and current University of Tennessee Director of Player Personnel Bob Welton to talk about the differences between evaluating talent in the pros compared to the college ranks. The guys also break down the latest crop of rookie Vols, including Eagles 1st round pick Derek Barnett and Saints running back Alvin Kamara. DJ is then joined by NFL Media’s Shaun O’Hara to project which bottom five teams in the major statistical categories can rise to the top 10 in 2017.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
